text: Cyclone Bodil (also Cyclone Xaver) was a winter storm that affected Western Europe. This storm brought intense snowfall and strong wind to Sweden and the United Kingdom. Belgium, Germany, The Netherlands, Denmark and Poland also suffered from strong winds and downpours. Several people died. Most of them in Sweden. ==References== Category:2013 in the United Kingdom Category:2013 in Europe Category:2013 in weather Category:2013 in Sweden Category:2010s in Belgium Category:2013 in Germany Category:2010s in the Netherlands Category:2010s in Denmark Category:2010s in Poland
title: Cyclone Bodil
